title: In Praise of the Ironsmith - purpose

content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the poem’s primary purpose?

choices.label: To express frustration over the colonization of the city-states along the Swahili Coast by the Portuguese
To praise the speaker’s husband for his craft and express gratitude for the wealth it provides
To convey sadness over the expansion of the slave trade in Africa and the breakup of families
To celebrate the wealth generated by the growth of trade along the coast of the Indian Ocean

content.answer: To praise the speaker’s husband for his craft and express gratitude for the wealth it provides

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
